page.title: 06Sport
page.content: Although football is a big sport in Britain there are no organised teams in our area.You would have to go to Dundee, Perth or Kirkcaldy to see first division football .If you were prepared to go to Cupar you could join the atheletics club, the cricket club or Cupar Hearts football club, or the Howe of Fife Rugby Club. In this part of Fife golf is a common sport with courses at Ladybank, St.Michael's outside Leuchars, Scotscraig in Tayport and 4 courses at St.Andrews. Curling is another popular sport with Forret Curling Club using the rinks at Perth ,Dundee ,Glenrothes and Kinross. Schools in Scotland are starting to play short tennis and softball cricket .Cupar has a swimming pool which is well used. Schools use the pool five mornings per week to teach their pupils to swim.
